mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_asset (branch_id,product_id,price,guaratee_term,check_seq,state,emp_id,create_time,create_emp , sn , run_state) VALUES (#{branchId},#{productId},#{price},#{guarateeTerm},#{checkSeq},#{state},#{empId},#{createTime},#{createEmp} , #{sn} , #{runState})
mapper.select: select * from t_asset t where t.asset_id = #{value}

SELECT goodstype_id , goodstype_name , brand_id , brand_name , product_id , product_name,COUNT(*) cnt FROM v_asset s WHERE s.branch_id = #{branchId} AND state = 2 GROUP BY s.goodstype_id , s.goodstype_name , s.brand_id , s.brand_name , s.product_id , s.product_name
